Patient 27: Patient 27 is a 72-year-old male with a history of chronic kidney disease stage 4 and anemia. He is currently on erythropoietin injections and a low-dose aspirin regimen. His medication history includes a previous use of ACE inhibitors, which were discontinued due to worsening renal function. There is no documented family history of kidney disease, and his allergy history is unclear. He has been advised to avoid NSAIDs due to his renal condition.
